issue.title: [CF 243] Overlay GCD on Icons per Group
issue.body:
Having an option per group to enable a transparent (or even allow alpha to be adjusted) GCD similar to how the GCD animation appears on the buttons on the action bars.

This would completely replace some of the CLC addons i use to tell me what ability to fire off. It's tell me i need to use an ability but of course i've still in the middle of a GCD but here i an staring at my group of icons :)

Thanks for this addon as well - most useful addon i've used in WoW.


> Posted by CurseForge user behub | Imported from CurseForge issue #243 | Raw

comments.body:
There already is an option to ignore the GCD globally, found in TMW's main options (/tmw options).  Just to be sure, you would like to have control over this setting at the group level instead of the global level?


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

It's more of a visual thing to actually see the GCD cooldown on top of the icon


> Posted by CurseForge user behub

You can already do this by disabling the option to ignore the GCD for timers.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
